summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeDrybar's Big Swig Thickening Spray plumps hair strands to instantly create long-lasting thicker, fuller-looking hair and a soft, touchable finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsGreat for all hair typesSafe for color-treated hair and extensionsPeptide Proteins: Help thicken and plump each hair strand up to 10 hours (clinically tested)Bilberry Extract: Provides allover fullness and body and leaves a soft, touchable finishRice Bran: Helps protect from UVA and UVB rays that cause dryness and color fadingOriginal Scent: Notes of jasmine, sandalwood and Madagascar vanillaVeganCruelty-freeFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesKeratinGlutenNuts/Nut OilsHoneyItem 2578791How To UseMist generously on damp hair from roots to ends. Comb through and style as usual.IngredientsAqua (Water, Eau), Pisum Sativum (Pea) Peptide, Propanediol, Heptyl Glucoside, Coconut Oil Glycereth-8 Esters, Panthenol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, PVP, Maltodextrin/VP Copolymer, Alaria Esculenta Extract, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Isochrysis Galbana Extract, Pentylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Polysorbate 20, Potassium Hydroxide, Sodium Phytate, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Alcohol, Tocopherol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Mist generously on damp hair from roots to ends. Comb through and style as usual.

reviews.headline: So disappointed!
reviews.comments: I have used the mousse of the same product line for several months and really like it. It was not available so I tried this spray instead. It is super sticky and feels like I have something weighing down my hair-I couldn't wait to wash it out. Not the same thing at all.

reviews.headline: Works great on thin and fine hair
reviews.comments: I have always appreciated, dry bar products, and love their signature sent. However, for thickening and fullness. I was a big fan of a competitors brand (Ouai). Unfortunately, they are no longer offering their thickening  spray. So I was relieved when I stumbled upon the Big Swig spray it is fantastic alternative.

reviews.headline: Will be Returning
reviews.comments: I used as directed on damp hair & this set up like cement on my hair!  I could barely get a brush or comb through it & my hair is fine, not thick, which is why I purchased this product for volume.  I almost rewashed my hair before going to work to get the product out of my hair.

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: Amazing - the only product that has worked on my wavy thin hair!

reviews.headline: Will be returning
reviews.comments: I used this as directed, spraying on my damp hair and once it was dry it felt as if I had a ton if hairspray in my hair. It also had the opposite effect and left my hair super flat.

reviews.headline: Thickens
reviews.comments: I spray this on my widening thinning part and it works great at adding thickness.

reviews.headline: This product is not sticky, just wonderful!
reviews.comments: I tried this product to give my hair fullness and it it worked!  It is not abrasive or sticky, and you can comb or brush through your hair the next day.  I have straight hair and absolutely love this product!!!!

reviews.headline: Tried again and I do love it!
reviews.comments: I had previously rated this as just ok.....but I gave it another try, using a little more of the product this time. Wow my hair does have a lot more volume! Still does have a bit of a weird odor when using a curling appliance, but it does go away. So it seems the trick is to not use too much, but also not too little.

reviews.headline: It's just ok
reviews.comments: I didn't notice much a of a difference using this product. It has a nice fragrance, and it didn't cause my hair to feel sticky; however, I was careful not to use too much after reading some of the reviews. Maybe I need to use more? Still, I should have noticed something. Oh, it DID smell bad when I used my flat iron.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: Doesn't do at all like it states

reviews.headline: Returned !!!!!!
reviews.comments: Was very nice the first day of use, second day I felt I needed to wash my hair very gummy feeling , left it feeling dirty and stiff ..

reviews.headline: Not
reviews.comments: Says to apply generously but it foams up and feels like you left shampoo in your hair and when it dries it's stiff and sticky to the touch

reviews.headline: Does the Job!
reviews.comments: I love the scent of DryBar products.  Always just like I've walked out of a salon.  This offers some thickening but is also makes hair a little stiff and harder to blow out.  But it does the job and I'd repurchase it. Gifted by drybar.

reviews.headline: This actually does what it promises!
reviews.comments: I've tried so, so many volumizing and thickening products that promised what this one delivers.  This product is worth it!

reviews.headline: Love This
reviews.comments: I love this for blowing my hair out quickly and with the best possible volume! My hair dries faster and looks smooth and amazing. I'll definitely be repurchasing this as soon as I use it up!

reviews.headline: Results go CRAZY
reviews.comments: I'm always looking for new volumizing/thickening products and this one was AMAZING! I had volume all throughout my hair not just at the crown, and the body of my hair was definitely visibly thicker. The product was very lightweight and had a fresh scent. Dry bar products never do me wrong, and this one will be added to my new line up for sure! This product was gifted to me by Drybar.

reviews.headline: Great all day volume
reviews.comments: Complimentary from Drybar. I have thin hair and its always hard to get volumen or keep it. This Thickening Spray gives me great volume last all day and doesn't leave that sticky overcast or powdery feeling on your hair.

reviews.headline: Makes my hair thick and sexy!
reviews.comments: I am blown away by how much thicker and voluminous my hair was after using Big Swig Thickening Spray gifted by DryBar. It smells nice and didn't leave a residue or awkward feeling to my hair. It's perfect for fine hair like mine!

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: I love how much volume this spray added to my hair. It didn't have a hard finish like some thickening sprays do and left my hair nice and soft. It also smells great. I received this product complimentary from drybar

reviews.headline: Lightweight and thickening
reviews.comments: This was gifted by Dry Bar in return for an honest review. I really love using this thickening spray! It adds more volume to my hair, which is great for thick hair too! The spray is lightweight so no greasy residue is left over.

faceoff_positive.comments: The most amazing root lifter! I use it almost everyday and get the best volume.
faceoff_positive.headline: The best thinking spray

faceoff_negative.comments: Spraying it in my hair was a hassle, it got on my face and arms and was sticky. Sprayed it from my roots to the end of my hair just like the bottle says. Woke up the next morning with amazing thick hair but my scalp was so itchy! Before you say anything, I don't have dandruff or lice so that's not why. This product just made my scalp dry and uncontrollably itchy
faceoff_negative.headline: Itchy scalp
